question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. horse
B. taxi
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The horse is in the foreground, occupying the right side of the frame and filling a large portion of the image, while the taxi is in the background, clearly behind the horse.
